title: "Mayo Clinic Platform portfolio company buys AI electrophysiology startup"
excerpt: "Anumana is also a portfolio company of Nference, another spinoff of Mayo Clinic Platform, the digital health and data innovation arm of Rochester, Minn.-based Mayo Clinic. As part of the deal, Nference bought the rights for NeuTrace's Data Biome platform for uses outside of cardiovascular care."
